page.title: 16LOCAL ISSUES IN CRAWLEY DOWN
page.content: People in Crawley Down and Turners Hill have a concern about the amount of{traffic}in the villages; more so in Turners Hill where the school conducts an{annual traffic count.}The main concern in Crawley Down is {aircraft noise,}because the aeroplanes that land and take off at{Gatwick}pass over the village (which they should not do). They are concerned about aircraft noise too at the{Mobile Home {Park}at{Fen Place.}Another thing that bothers the people of Crawley Down is the lack of a{policeman.}Crawley Down is bigger than both Turners Hill and {Copthorne}and yet is the only village without a policeman. People think that if Crawley Down had a policeman it would reduce the amount of{vandalism. People also feel that there might not be so much vandalism if there were more things for{young people}to do.
